                    "off"

                "ID": 59,
                "LastModifyTime": "",
                "Max": 0,
                "Min": 0,
                "Name": "default_transaction_read_only",
                "NeedReboot": false,
                "ParamDescriptionCH": "This parameter controls whether each new transaction is read-only by default. The default value is `off` (read/write)",
                "ParamDescriptionEN": "Sets the default read-only status of new transactions.",
                "ParamValueType": "bool",
                "SpecRelated": false,
                "Unit": ""
            }
        ],
        "RequestId": "",
        "TotalCount": 1
    }
}

    "Response": {
        "DBEngine": "postgresql",
        "DBMajorVersion": "12",
        "ParamInfoSet": [
            {
                "Advanced": false,
                "ClassificationCN": "WAL",
                "ClassificationEN": "Write-Ahead Log",
                "CurrentValue": "logical",
                "DefaultValue": "replica",
                "EnumValue": [
                    "replica",
                    "logical"
                ],
                "ID": 854,
                "LastModifyTime": "",
                "Max": 0,
                "Min": 0,
                "Name": "wal_level",

ModifyBackupDownloadRestriction.title: Modifying the backup download restrictions

ModifyBackupPlan.document: This example shows you how to modify the backup plan of instance "postgres-xxxxxxxx". According to the new backup plan, the instance will be backed up during 01:00:00–02:00:00 AM and the backup files will be retained for three days.
ModifyBackupPlan.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: postgres.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyBackupPlan
<Common request parameters>

{
    "BackupPeriod": [
        "tuesday",
        "monday"
    ],
    "BaseBackupRetentionPeriod": "3",
    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-xxxxxxxx",
    "MinBackupStartTime": "01:00:00",
    "MaxBackupStartTime": "02:00:00"
}
ModifyBackupPlan.title: Modifying the backup plan of instance

POST / HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json

{

    "DBInstanceId": "postgres-9n26zs6n",
    "NewExpireTime": "2023-02-18 23:59:59"
}
ModifyBaseBackupExpireTime.title: Modifying the expiration time of a full backup
